meanings.definition: Relating to the sounds of speech.
meanings.sent1: The phonematic analysis helped us understand the different speech sounds.
meanings.sent2: Her phonematic skills made her a great language learner.
meanings.sent3: The phonematic puzzle game was both fun and educational.
meanings.sent4: His phonematic memory was like a library of spoken words.
meanings.sent5: The phonematic nature of the language made it easy to distinguish words.

meanings.sent1: The phonematic symbols represented different phonemes in the language.
meanings.sent2: Studying phonematic patterns helped her recognize phonemes in words.
meanings.sent3: The phonematic quiz challenged students to identify various phonemes.
meanings.sent4: Her phonematic understanding was like unlocking the secrets of language.
meanings.sent5: The phonematic analysis revealed the complexity of phonemes in speech.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the study of speech sounds.
meanings.sent1: The phonematic research focused on analyzing speech sounds.
meanings.sent2: Teachers use phonematic tools to teach students about speech sounds.
meanings.sent3: The phonematic experiment explored the effects of different speech sounds.
meanings.sent4: His phonematic expertise made him a valuable asset in speech sound research.
meanings.sent5: The phonematic study shed light on the intricacies of speech sounds.
